title: Production snapshot: 2025-06-15
text:
The following packages are staged for the 2025-06-15 Production snapshot because they passed R-multiverse checks at least once during the month-long period leading up to the snapshot date.
This package list empties out during every dependency freeze, repopulates every candidate freeze, and stays constant during the month after the Production snapshot. See the Production schedule for specific dates. See the Production documentation for details.

Version
Last published in Staging repository

title: R-multiverse package status
text: This website reports the check status of each package on R-multiverse.

title: R-multiverse package status
text:
Production
The Production status page lists the packages staged for the targeted Production snapshot. Packages are staged for Production if they pass R-multiverse checks at least once in the month-long period prior to the snapshot date.

title: R-multiverse package status
text:
Status summaries
The following pages list packages with R-multiverse check issues.

Community issues
Staging issues

title: R-multiverse package status
text:
Status details
Each package has its own human-readable HTML page and RSS feed for each of Community and Staging. For example, the polars package has:




HTML
RSS




Community
community/polars.html
community/polars.xml


Staging
staging/polars.html
staging/polars.xml
